original_text: Hezekiah chose some men as captains to lead the men of his army. He told them to meet together in the open place near the city's gate. He said to them,
korean_text: 군대 지휘관들을 세워 백성을 거느리게 하고 성문 광장에서 자기 앞에 무리를 모으고 말로 위로하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah chose some men as captains
to lead the men of his army
He told them to meet together
in the open place near the city's gate
